title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][Draconic Evolution——龙之进化(龙之研究)][搬运授权]排版更新了
author: 6B不止铅笔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 6B不止铅笔 于 2020-8-24 11:38 编辑 
前言由于原搬运者说自己不更新帖子了，且上搬运悬赏令了，所以不要理解为二搬
原搬运帖：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-556145-1-1.html
搬运悬赏令：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-643850-1-1.html帖内图片无法查看解决办法：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-864710-1-1.html
介绍龙之进化是围绕着”龙“这个元素制作的，有众多的机器以及上古末影龙。拥有BUG级别的神龙反应炉和电池。这是科技向的一个模组，一套霸气的龙装，以及效率惊人的工具，而且都是无限耐久只耗电也使用RF能源，发电和储能都是非常可观的，自带一本指导手册，上手并不难。
搬运授权

下载地址下载链接：https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/draconic-evolution/files/all前置链接：https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/project-intelligence/relations/dependencies
1.7.10只需要下前置链接中的第1个1.10.2、1.11.2需要下前置链接中的前2个1.12.X需要下前置链接中的第1、2、4个，第3个可以不下载
下载方法打开页面，找到“Game Version”旁的“All Version”选择框并点击选择你想要下载的版本
关于“将物品放置于地面”刷拔刀的修复办法用压缩工具打开mod本体，将下列文件放入到“com\brandon3055\draconicevolution\common\network”（此方法由@Junior_Mo ，即司徒小莫dalao提供）



PlacedItemPacket$Handler.rar
(1.91 KB, 下载次数: 2982)



2018-5-20 21:34 上传
点击文件名下载附件
刷拔刀的修复包阅读权限: 10





疑问解答Q：1.12.1版本怎么下载A：和1.12版本通用，下载1.12版本就行了Q：楼主你更新帖子（解疑）快一点啊A：本人学生党，不能及时更新帖子和解疑，但是像一些可以发到mod问答版的问题我不会回复Q：为什么这个mod有2个中文译名A：因为1.7.10的译名是龙之研究，1.10.2及以上版本译名是龙之进化，且2个译名作者都认可了。现1.7.10版本已更正为龙之进化，详细的关于汉化文件说明请看帖子后面Q：为什么中文名称还写着龙之进化（曾用名：龙之研究）A：为了你们方便搜索毕竟大多数人都习惯叫龙之研究嘛
图片


关于本MOD的汉化1.7.10的汉化是我通过MC中文MOD百科中的方法修复的，由于操作繁琐，已经将修复好的文件上传



1.7.10汉化文件.rar
(25.49 KB, 下载次数: 4958)



2018-5-15 20:37 上传
点击文件名下载附件
阅读权限: 10




1.10.2及以上的汉化是从主流mod汉化材质包里上传给作者的（翻译不完全请装新版主流mod汉化材质包）主流mod汉化包站内地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-696592-1-1.html
关于curseforge打开慢的问题这里贴的是酒石酸dalao的教程：https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv151746
mod更新日志（从我搬运的版本开始）2020.6.24######## 2.3.25.351 ########-Fixed world gen attempting to gen chaos crystal when chaos crystal is disabled.-Fixed incorrect block resistance when reactor is is running.-Fixed edge case null pointer with energy core.-Added config option to disable guardian creative damage.-Fixed placed items bypassing vanilla spawn protection.-Added config option to remove entity detector power requirement.-Fixed crash related to bound dislocators (Theoretically)-Fixed player attributes not syncing when teleporting between dimensions. (BrandonsCore Change)-Added config option to disable armor FOV correction.-Fixed minor client de-sync when adding stacks of fuel to advanced dislocator.-Merge pull request #1352 from FoxMcloud5655/1.12.2-toggleshield (Added Togglable Shields and Performance Upgrades)2019.8.2######## 2.3.24.349 ########-Fixed Draconium chest furnace freezing when backed up.-Fixed furnace in Draconium chest not pulling from the last slot.
######## 2.3.23.345 ########-ReFixed Baubles crash. (Seems last fix got lost in the mail)-Fixed broken creative flux capacitor
######## 2.3.22.343 ########-Fixed crash when Baubles is not installed.-Optimized retro gen a little.-Fixed some compounding residual particle lag.2019.7.6######## 2.3.23.345 ########-ReFixed Baubles crash. (Seems last fix got lost in the mail)-Fixed broken creative flux capacitor
######## 2.3.22.343 ########-Fixed crash when Baubles is not installed.-Optimized retro gen a little.-Fixed some compounding residual particle lag.
######## 2.3.21.342 ########-Fixed impossible null pointer exception in ExplosionFX-Added compatibility between ICustomArmor and Baubles (Allows other mods to add baubles DE armor abilities)-Fixed capacitor only charging baubles when in a baubles slot.-Fixed capacitor always charging baubles when in a baubles slot. (even when disabled)-Added optional key bindings to cycle tool AOE.-Added fully upgraded versions of all tools and armor to creative menu (and JEI).-Added item blacklist for draconium chest.-Particle gen render distance now depends on particle sale.-Fixed Particle gen tile not getting removed when the tile is destroyed.-Fixed upgrading tools not copying enchantments.-Shift clicking to add fuel to a Dislocator now adds 64 at a time.-Fixed out of order rows in GuiToolConfig-Fixed ore generating in chaos island rings when ore gen is disabled.-Fixed fusion crafter comparator output not accounting for injector tier.2019.5.13######## 2.3.22.343 ########-Fixed crash when Baubles is not installed.-Optimized retro gen a little.-Fixed some compounding residual particle lag.
######## 2.3.21.342 ########-Fixed impossible null pointer exception in ExplosionFX-Added compatibility between ICustomArmor and Baubles (Allows other mods to add baubles DE armor abilities)-Fixed capacitor only charging baubles when in a baubles slot.-Fixed capacitor always charging baubles when in a baubles slot. (even when disabled)-Added optional key bindings to cycle tool AOE.-Added fully upgraded versions of all tools and armor to creative menu (and JEI).-Added item blacklist for draconium chest.-Particle gen render distance now depends on particle sale.-Fixed Particle gen tile not getting removed when the tile is destroyed.-Fixed upgrading tools not copying enchantments.-Shift clicking to add fuel to a Dislocator now adds 64 at a time.-Fixed out of order rows in GuiToolConfig-Fixed ore generating in chaos island rings when ore gen is disabled.-Fixed fusion crafter comparator output not accounting for injector tier.
######## 2.3.20.333 ########-Fixed crash crashing/broken dislocators.-Re added ore dict for nether and end draconium.-Made nether, end and overworld draconium ore equivalent. (they all have the same drop rate for dusts)-Increased the cluster size for overworld and nether draconium ore.-Pulled PR to add shield-related config values and fixed spelling/grammar in config file2018.11.2######## 2.3.17.321 (hotfix) ########-Fixed breaking change to Fusion Crafting API. (fixed crash with Solar Flux Reborn)
######## 2.3.16.319 ########-Moved Json recipe loading top post init to ensure all recipes added by DE and other mods are loaded before the json is parsed.-Added ability to turn off the basic generator with a redstone signal.-Added AE2 Spacial IO Compat.-Added auto feed function to Draconic Helmet-Added long support for custom fusion recipe energy cost.-Fixed tools ant armor loosing power/upgrades when upgraded from Wyvern to Draconic.-Hopefully fixed gravestones spawning when the player is saved by DE's last stand effect.-Attempted to fix a crash when crystals are mined with oreexcavation.-Fixed broken arrow death message.-Fixed buggy FOV warping applied by leggings speed effect.-Added option to leggings to completely disable FOV warping.-Fixed some bugs with bound portals.-Bound portals now deactivate temporarily (client side only) on arrival to avoid disorienting the player.-Fixed chat never ending spam from bound portal when destination can not be found.-Fixed bound dislocators allowing teleportation to an inactive destination portal.-Added "auto assemble" feature to Energy Core.2018.9.22######## 2.3.15.311 ########-Fixed grinder getting stuck on invulnerable mobs.-修复怪物磨床在检测到不可击杀的生物不工作-Added grinder blacklist.-增加怪物磨床击杀生物的黑名单######## 2.3.14.307 ########-Fixed AOE mining not taking modified player reach distance into account.-修复在使用aoe范围挖掘时没有考虑更改玩家离鼠标指针前最近方块的距离-Fixed reactor not handling IO sides properly when outputting energy.-修复神龙反应堆在输出能量时没有正确显示“能量储量”条-Attempted top fix broken gui's caused by broken mob souls courtesy of Headcrumbs.-试图修复由生物灵魂模型头部造成的GUI顶部崩坏-Fixed Advanced Dislocator not working in portal or pedestal.-修复高级传送符咒无法在传送门或传送符咒基座中工作-Fixed crash when using CTRL-Pick Block on placed items.-修复在已放置的物品上使用CTRL-Pick Block时出现崩溃。2018.7.29-Fixed particle generator transparency issue.-修复粒子发生器透明度的问题-Enabled negative gravity for particles.-启用反重力的粒子效果-Added ability to shift click-drag decimal sliders in particle generator for precise more adjustment.-在粒子发生器中增加拖动滑块的功能，以便进行更精确的调整-Fixed tools (and hopefully bows) resetting when their NBT changes due to charging.-修复工具 (希望包括弓) 因充电而导致的NBT改变2018.6.23-Dropped support for mc 1.12 (Now requires mc 1.12.2)-Fixed spawner not spawning slime outside of slime chunks.-Fixed broken crystal logic causing unintended chunk loading.-Fixed issue with contributor downloader throwing errors-Fixed generator consuming fuel container items.-Reduced NBT clutter on tiles when harvested.-Fixed jei fusion recipe integer overflow with expensive custom recipes.-Added configs to disable the armor hit sound and renderer.-Added optional key binding to toggle item dislocator.-DE now forcibly sets the thrower of item stacks where forge for whatever reason does not (can be disabled) This is needed for the Item Dislocator.-Tweaked Draconic Helmet NV logic. Helmet will now only clear NV effect if lock mode is enabled end night vision is disabled.-Added "Layer" view to the energy core build guide.-Reduced the rate at which the armor shield can be attacked to once every 4 ticks.-Fixed EIO broken spawner -> stabilized spawner conversion recipe.-Attempted to fix issue with enchantment config toggling the wrong enchantment.-Added config option to enable recipes that clear nbt from crystals, injectors, etc..2018.4.27-Fixed tool stats config not getting applied properly.-Added ability to move portals, reactors and energy cores with Funky Locomotion.-Added baubles support to magnet and capacitor.-Added config to disable chaos island explosion.-Fixed swords being able to mine any block that does not require a tool.-Fixed missing FE capability on Fusion Crafting Injector.-Added ability to link energy crystals via bound portals.-Added input mode option to wireless energy crystals.2018.2.26-Fixed issue with item dislocator pickup sound playing continuously.-Fixed swords being ineffective against blocks like web and leaves.-Fixed issue were portal blocks could be broken and placed in survival.-Removed IInventory support from placed items as it was never intended to be a thing and may have caused some dupe bugs.2018.1.5-Re added toggle flight key binding-Fixed entity path finding crash related to placed items.2017.12.29-Fixed console spam from placed items due to incorrect implementation of a safety check2017.12.21-Switched to proper metric extensions for large energy values (Giga RF 'G', Tera RF 'T', Peta RF 'P', Exa RF 'E')-Tweaked the Crystal Binder selection renderer.-Fixed broken loot core tool tip.-Fixed issue where custom item entities added by mods show up as different entities entities in the entity detectors filter.-Re implemented junk filter in tools.-Fixed tool items entity accelerated physics issie.-Fixed potential name related crash in entity detector config gui.-Added ability to make draconic armor invisible.-Added some error checking for placed items that may help find the cause of recent issues.2017.11.9-Fixed some minor issues with retrogen and disabled retrogen console spam.-Added config option to adjust the dissenchanter xp cost.-Fixed entity detector not saving its filter configuration.-Removed "Dangerous alternative prefix" warning related to the ender crystal recipe override. (Was never an issue just an annoying warning)-Fixed edge case crash with guardian crystals.-Fixed shield not absorbing fall damage when jump boost is active.-Stopped the magnet taking items from IE belts.-Added ability to tweak some of the armor stats.-Added ability to have single placed items render full size by right clicking with a wrench.2017.9.12-Fixed mob grinder not updating its kill area when rotated with a wrench.-Fixed edge case issue where magnet may duplicate xp orbs.-Fixed potential edge case issue where the reactor gui JEI integration may crash.-Fixed broken potentiometer placement.-Fixed Fluid gate inserting into the wrong side of the target block which caused a crash when 2 fluid gates face each other.-Fixed core not being consumed when stabilizing a spawner.-Fixed energy pylon not supporting Forge Energy.-Fixed mobs spawned by wyvern tier or higher spawner instantly despawning if no player is around. Mobs are now persistent for 30 seconds.-Fixed placed items not respecting the config field to disable them.-Added the Dislocation Normalization Field Projector (Prevents item dislocator collecting items within 5 blocks.)2017.8.9-Fixed armor damage sound firing when 0 damage is actually taken.-Fixed crash when inserting items into draconic chest.-Fixed solid blocks allowing light to pass through them.-Fixed Draconium Chest colour showing as black when world loads until chest is opened.
本帖更新日志2020.8.24：更新图片源+1.12.2-2.3.25.351-universal2019.12.31：更新1.12.2-2.3.24.349-universal2019.7.22：更新1.12.2-2.3.23.345-universal2019.6.27：更新1.12.2-2.3.22.343-universal2018.11.3：更新1.12.2-2.3.17.321-universal2018.5.26：更新排版2018.5.20：上传司徒小莫dalao提供的刷拔刀修复文件2018.5.15：更新1.7.10汉化2018.1.17：更新图片源2017.11.26：添加下载教程2017.8.25：本帖发布[groupid=1645]Nuclear Fusion[/groupid]

replies.author: h935047213
replies.txt_content:
差评！
理由:
下载链接：https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/draconic-evolution
前置链接：https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/brandons-core
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/codechicken-lib-1-8
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/redstone-flux
1.7.10只需要下载第1个链接的那个，1.10.2、1.11.2需要下前面2个，1.12需要3个全下
所谓的第一个链接下载到的是Draconic-Evolution-1.12-2.3.4.265-universal.jar，并不能用于1.7.10版本！
